definition[0]: said or written at the beginning of a book, speech etc in order to explain what it is about
example[0]: as the chairman said in his introductory remarks
example[1]: the objectives described in the introductory chapter
definition[1]: intended for people who have never done a particular activity before
example[2]: an introductory course in data processing
definition[2]: a special low price that is charged for a new product for a limited period of time
example[3]: It will normally sell for £12 but as an introductory offer the booklet is available for just £10, until the end of the month.
